sentence: In trading on Monday, shares of Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $154.32, changing hands as high as $154.92 per share.
Salesforce.com Inc shares are currently trading up about 2.9% on the day.

The chart below shows the one year performance of CRM shares, versus its 200 day moving average:

Looking at the chart above, CRM's low point in its 52 week range is $113.60 per share, with $167.56 as the 52 week high point — that compares with a last trade of $154.61.
